poem:
### The New Recruit

In the digital dawn,  
soldiers stand side by side  
with circuits and codes,  
listening for algorithms' whispers,  
as gears take pulse of land.  
No camouflage for cold steel hearts,  
or silence in the march.  
We harness the unseen,  
yet hear echoes of engines,  
wondering if machines dream  
of battles won.
